statements.query: MATCH (n:APIGatewayClientCertificate)<-[:HAS_CERTIFICATE]-(:APIGatewayStage)<-[:ASSOCIATED_WITH]-(:RestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:APIGatewayClientCertificate)<-[r:HAS_CERTIFICATE]-(:APIGatewayStage)<-[:ASSOCIATED_WITH]-(:RestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (n:APIGatewayStage)<-[:ASSOCIATED_WITH]-(:RestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:APIGatewayStage)<-[r:ASSOCIATED_WITH]-(:RestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (n:APIGatewayResource)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:RestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:APIGatewayResource)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:RestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (n:RestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:RestAPI)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
